name: nix-couchdb-replicate
description: A cli tool that does a one-off, one-way replication of all databases in one CouchDB installation to another CouchDB installation
author: Nikhil Sinha

devDependencies.dotenv: Installed in devDependencies rather than dependencies because only the setup script uses the environment, not the app itself.
devDependencies.eslint: Main eslint package. Installed on initialization of eslint (npm init @eslint/config).
devDependencies.eslint-config-prettier: Turns off all rules that are unnecessary or might conflict with prettier.
devDependencies.eslint-config-standard: eslint style guide that enforces Javascript Standard Style (https://standardjs.com/). Installed on initialization of eslint (npm init @eslint/config).
devDependencies.eslint-plugin-import: Installed on initialization of eslint (npm init @eslint/config).
devDependencies.eslint-plugin-n: Installed on initialization of eslint (npm init @eslint/config).
devDependencies.eslint-plugin-promise: Installed on initialization of eslint (npm init @eslint/config).
